content: नैगम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (मी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [निगम-अण्] Relating to or occurring in the Veda or holy writings; as in °कांडं. --मः {@--1@} An interpreter of the Vedas or sacred writings; इति नैगमाः {@--2@} An Upaniṣad <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--3@} A means, an expedient. {@--4@} Prudent conduct. {@--5@} A citizen, towns-man. {@--6@} A trader, merchant; धाराहारोपनयनपरा नैगमाः सानुमंतः <ls>V. 4. 4.</ls>
